/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the vibrant city life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban architecture. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and motorcycles, parked and in motion, dot the street, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day.
